api allata with eya bala sanahi eya winda ganime chethanawen alla pamula jalashayata bassemu.me athara rawith samare mamath athara magadi hamuwu aluth mithurath samanga madhuwitha his kirime niratha wiya.pasuwa apa danagath paridi samare mama ek wathawakuth aluth mithura ek wathawakuth pamanak maduwitha gena athi athara ra bothalaye ithiri siyallath leman jin bothalaye thunen ekak pamanath his kota aththe rawith thaniwamaya.api namen pasu elamulla handiye kadayen gena bath mul rasa windemu.
mama kattiyata sansun wenna kiwwata wan eka api inne ali mankadaka bawath, me ali ena welawa bawath mage hitha kagahala mathakkala.

idiri wasara dahaya athulatha lekhawus aayathanaya sanwardhanaye hinipeththatama gena yana bawa lekhawus aayathanaye sabhapathi jyeshta madhyawedi bandula padmakumara mahatha pawasayi.ee sandaha aayathanaye ihala sewakayage sita pahalama sewakaya dakwa kapawimen wada kala yuthu bawa da sabhapathiwaraya sandahan keleya.lekhawus aayathanaye wasara 35k saha wasara 25ka kalayak sewaya kala sewakayan agayima sandaha taj samudra hotalaye pasugiyada pawathi uthsawaye di sabhapathi bandula padmakumara mahatha mese prakasha keleya.wiwidha deshapalana halahappimwalata muhuna demin lekhawus aayathanaya idiriyata pamina thibena bawath, mema aayathanaya wada paladayi lesa thawa thawath mahajanathawa atharata gena yama thama aramuna bawath sabhapathiwaraya kiweya.wadiduratath adahas dakwu sabhapathiwaraya mese da kiweya.dirgha kalayak me aayathanayata sewaya kirima gana oba siyalu denata sabawinma sthu¬Æthiwantha wenawa.idiriyatath obagen sahayogaya labenu athayi wishwasa karanawa.
